title: New Project Risk Assessment
description: A GRC analyst must conduct a security risk assessment for a new internal project to develop a mobile application.

tasks.description: Review the project's design documents to understand the application's architecture and data flows.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst gains a thorough understanding of the proposed application.

tasks.description: Conduct a threat modeling exercise to identify potential threats and vulnerabilities in the design.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies several potential threats, such as insecure data storage on the mobile device.

tasks.description: Create a risk register for the project, documenting the identified risks and recommending security requirements for the developers to implement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst provides the project team with actionable security requirements to mitigate the identified risks.
